intro.description: I build high-converting, deeply creative web applications tailored to your business needs.

projects.daberhaDesc: Personal finance web app for tracking budgets, expenses, and financial goals in a clear and simple way
projects.portfolioDesc: A digital portfolio for poet Hossam Abdelmalek to showcase poems, excerpts, and books with dynamic content management.
projects.daberhaOverview: Daberha is a comprehensive personal finance web application built to help users seamlessly track their budgets, log daily expenses, and set long-term financial goals.
projects.daberhaProblem: Many existing financial apps are often cluttered, overly complex, or require linking bank accounts which creates privacy concerns for average users.
projects.daberhaSolution: Engineered a highly intuitive, privacy-first tracker with a modern dashboard. I implemented dynamic charts for visual spending insights, robust authentication, and a scalable database architecture to handle thousands of transactions smoothly.
projects.portfolioOverview: A digital portfolio designed specifically for a poet to showcase poems, literary excerpts, and published books. It features a clean, minimalist design that puts the written word front and center.
projects.portfolioProblem: The client needed a professional online presence that allowed easy management of their poetry and writings without needing technical knowledge to update the site.
projects.portfolioSolution: Developed a custom Frontend integrated with a Headless CMS (like Sanity/Contentful) allowing the poet to seamlessly add new works. The UI uses typography-focused design to ensure excellent readability.
projects.reactSkillsOverview: An interactive showcase built with React, demonstrating various frontend capabilities and modern toolings. It focuses on clean code structure and reusable components.
projects.reactSkillsProblem: Many junior developers struggle to showcase their React skills effectively beyond basic counters or to-do apps. They need a comprehensive example.
projects.reactSkillsSolution: Created a modular portfolio-style showcase that includes complex state management, custom hooks, context API usage, and performance optimizations. It serves as both a proof of skill and a learning resource.

about.description1: I design and build modern websites that are easy to use.
about.description2: Focused on clean design, strong performance, and real usability.

services.service1Desc: Designing and developing a complete website from scratch, tailored to your business.
services.service1Offer: I design and develop a complete website tailored to your business or personal brand.
service1Included: Understanding your goals and target audience
services.service1BestFor: Businesses, startups, creators, or anyone who needs a full professional website.
services.service2Desc: Turn your existing Figma design into a fully functional, pixel-perfect website.
services.service2Offer: I turn your Figma (or XD) design into a fully functional website.
services.service2BestFor: Designers, agencies, or clients who already have a finished design.
services.service3Desc: Optimizing websites to be blazing fast and fully responsive on mobile.
services.service3Offer: I optimize your website to be faster, smoother, and mobile-friendly.
services.service3Results: Faster websites · Better Google rankings · Lower bounce rates
services.service4Desc: Manage your site's content easily without needing a developer every time.
services.service4Offer: I build a simple control panel so you can manage your content without a developer.
services.service4BestFor: Blogs, writers, businesses, and content-driven websites.
services.service5Desc: Sell physical or digital products online securely.
services.service5Offer: A complete online store for physical or digital products.
services.service5BestFor: Online businesses, course creators, and digital product sellers.
services.service6Offer: I build a unique, easy-to-manage personal site to showcase your work.
services.service6BestFor: Freelancers, artists, writers, and professionals looking for an online presence.

contact.heading: Get In Touch
contact.description: Whether you have a question or just want to say hi, I'll try my best to get back to you!
